## Checklist
- [ ] Branch name follows convention: `feature/<ticket>-<slug>` or `hotfix/<ticket>-<slug>`
- [ ] PR title is clear and descriptive
- [ ] Self-reviewed my own diff
- [ ] No secrets, API keys, or `.env` files committed
